detaileddescription.para:
Testers supported: OnBoard and OffBoard tester
values 2

briefdescription.para: initial state
'vehicle-identification-req' from Tester received
server socket from Tester accepted ('TcpAccepted')
'routing-activation-request' from Tester received

detaileddescription.para: Contains the definition of the states for a Tester
Contains the list of connected testers

briefdescription.para: Initialize the global data for this sub-module.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Check if global data is properly initialized TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_Init

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Init function of the module

briefdescription.para: Get the tester ID based on the socket handler.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource

simplesect.para: The index of the tester ( 0 -OnBoard, 1 - Offboard)

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case TEST_DoIP_Client__GetTesterID

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used in order to get the tester ID

briefdescription.para: Check if OnBoard tester is activated.

parameterdescription.para: - if routing activation was performed for OnBoard tester and is connected
- otherwise

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach return value TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOnboardTesterActivated TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOnboardTesterActivated_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOnboardTesterActivated_2

briefdescription.para: Check if OffBoard tester is activated.

parameterdescription.para: - if routing activation was performed for OffBoard tester and is connected
- otherwise

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach return value TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOffboardTesterActivated TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOffboardTesterActivated_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_IsOffboardTesterActivated_2

briefdescription.para: Get the total number of active sockets connections.

simplesect.para: Number of TCP active sockets connections

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the number of active socket connections TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetNumberOfActiveSockets TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetNumberOfActiveSockets_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetNumberOfActiveSockets_2

briefdescription.para: Get the pointer to UDP socket address from global variable.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the validity of the pointer to global variable TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTesterUdpSockAddr

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used in order to get the pointer to UDP socket address from global variable

briefdescription.para: Get the TCP tester logical address for a socket Handler.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the getter function TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterLogAddrFromSocketHdl

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used to get the logical address from socket handler

briefdescription.para: Get TCP tester logical address.

parameterdescription.para: - tester entity

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the getter function TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterLogAddr TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterLogAddr_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterLogAddr_2

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used to extract the tester logical address

briefdescription.para: Get TCP socket handler for tester from global variable.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the getter function TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterSocketHdl TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterSocketHdl_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterSocketHdl_2

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used to extract the tester TCP socket handler

briefdescription.para: Get the TCP socket handler from logical address.

parameterdescription.para: - terster logical address

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the getter function TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_GetTcpTesterSocketHdlFromLogAddr

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. Helper function used to extract the tester TCP socket handler

briefdescription.para: Add tester UDP socket address by updating the according fields in global var.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource
- pointer to IP address and port of the remote host

simplesect.para: As arranged with edge-node we will have only one Vehicle-announcement procedure even if we have more testers in parallel, so we copy the UDP-data to all tester data-sets;

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_AddTesterUdp

briefdescription.para: Establish socket connection with the tester.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource
- pointer to IP address and port of the remote host
- connection established succesfully
- ptherwise

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each return value TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_TcpAccepted

memberdef.argsstring: (SoMgr_SocketHdlType SocketHdl, TcpIp_SockAddrType *RemoteAddrPtr, const uint8 *BufPtr, uint16 Length)
memberdef.name: DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation

briefdescription.para: Processing function for the routing activation request.

parameterdescription.para: - socket handler identifying the local socket resource
- pointer to IP address and port of the remote host
- Routing Activation response
-length of response (parameter will never be referenced)

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the routing activation procedure TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation_2 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation_3 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation_4 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_RoutingActivation_5

briefdescription.para: Module's callback triggered by the SoMgr as result of event detected on reffered socket by TCP/IP stack.

parameterdescription.para: - socket on which the event occurred
- type of the event

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check incoming TcpIp events TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_TcpIp_Event

briefdescription.para: Called in order to close the TCP server socket.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to check the state of the socket TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_Terminate

briefdescription.para: Cyclic routine of the DoIP Client.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Provide different inputs in order to reach each case TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_MainFunction TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_MainFunction_1 TEST_DoIP_Client__DoIP_Client_MainFunction_2

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. The cyclic function of the module

briefdescription.para: Public interfaces for connection handling.
